title: V5 Beta Now Available!
message:
We are incredibly excited to announce the release of the first Firebot V5 Beta! Featuring a built-in MixPlay editor, overhauled commands, events, and timer systems, third party integrations, channel currencies, quotes, multi profile support, and so much more.

Update notes and download links: https://github.com/crowbartools/Firebot/releases/tag/v5.0.0-beta1.
